attributes.title: Broadway bridge with streetcar, Minneapolis, Minnesota

attributes.value: A Broadway crosstown streetcar exits the east end of the Broadway bridge over the Mississippi, Back then the bridge emptied onto 13th Avenue NE, not Broadway NE. The streetcar is number 2000, the first experimental lightweight car built by Twin City Rapid Transit in 1915.
attributes.label: Description

attributes.title: Removing streetcar tracks from the Broadway bridge, Minneapolis, Minnesota

attributes.value: Following the elimination of the Broadway line, worker remove the streetcar tracks from the deck of the Broadway bridge over the Mississippi River. The Grain Belt Brewery is visible in the distance.
